text: We have an <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extension-components/alert?hs_preview=FeEhZEqY-150822239884|Alert UI Component> if that helps?

Not at all because I want the behavior of this <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extensions-sdk#display-alert-banners> but with custom url inside, but when I use addAlert the methods takes as input only simple text and not a customization of a component. Do you have some suggestions?
So if I'm understanding correctly, you want to have a clickable link inside the `addAlert` banner, is that right?
Got it. Do you mind telling me more about your use case? How would this help you?
